title: Frederique Constant Men's FC315M4P6 Persuasion Stainless Steel Watch with Black Band
features: Stainless steel watch with silver-tone partially skeletonized dial featuring date window at six o'clock
40 mm stainless steel case with anti-reflective sapphire dial window
Water resistant to 50 m (165 ft): In general, suitable for short periods of recreational swimming, but not diving or snorkeling
description: Frederique Constant timepieces are assembled by hand in Geneve Switzerland, the most prestigious region for quality Swiss watch making, and an important seal of quality watches. This timepiece features a stainless steel case, silver guilloche dial with a open-cut circle displaying the mechanism, black Roman numerals and a black leather strap.
